comment._content:
Hi fontgangsta,

First Saturday has been around for more than ten years, as a free event for our community.   Ticketed exhibitions have also been presented from time to time, usually when a show costs much more than the typical suggested admission we charge would even begin to cover.   We simply could not afford to offer free admission for a show that requires significant revenue to support.  We do offer a discounted First Saturday price of $5, which is 50% off of the $10 ticket price.  

Alisa Martin, Visitor Services
